hero.title: Our Menu: Authentic Nepalese & Traditional British Cuisine
hero.subtitle: Bhutuwa chicken, Pokhareli fish curry, momo and British comfort plates served within Waterbeach's thatched coaching inn.

sections.description: Our Nepalese kitchen is led by the Gautam family, with dishes cooked to order and spice levels suited to every guest.
sections.allergenNotice: Please inform us of any allergies or dietary requirements when ordering.
